  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(int playerID)
      Constructor for a new player. Creates a new player with corresponding decks.
      Parameters:
      playerID - is the player ID the player has at the server

  • Method Details

    • refreshPlayer

      public void refreshPlayer()
      Method to refresh all decks of a player.

    • isRegisterFull

      public boolean isRegisterFull()
      Method to check if all registers are full.
      Returns:
      true if all registers are full

    • drawBlind

      public ArrayList<String> drawBlind()
      Method to draw cards from the deck into empty registers. Discards current hand. Then draws new cards into empty registers. Doesn't draw "Again" into first register.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of drawn cards

    • drawRegisterCards

      public Card drawRegisterCards()
      Method to draw a new card for registers. Shuffles deckDiscard into deckProgramming, if deckProgramming is empty.
      Returns:
      a new drawn card

    • discardHandCards

      public void discardHandCards()
      Method to discard all cards from deckHand into deckDiscard.

    • discardRegisterCards

      public void discardRegisterCards()
      Method to discard all cards from deckRegister into deckDiscard.

    • drawCardsProgramming

      public void drawCardsProgramming​(int amount)
      Method to draw new cards from the deck into the hand. Checks if there are enough cards in the programming deck to draw. If there is not enough cards left -> draws the rest of the deck, shuffles deckDiscard into deckProgramming and draws the rest of the needed cards.
      Parameters:
      amount - is the amount of cards you need to draw

    • shuffleDiscardIntoProgramming

      public void shuffleDiscardIntoProgramming()
      Method to shuffle deckDiscard into deckProgramming.

    • removeSelectedCard

      public Card removeSelectedCard​(String card)
      Method to select and remove a card from hand.
      Parameters:
      card - is the card one selects
      Returns:
      the removed card

    • pickRobot

      public void pickRobot​(int figure, String name)
      Method to assign a robot to a player
      Parameters:
      figure - is the robot
      name - is the username
